attributes.action: To investigate shutting down traffic lights at low traffic junctions during the periods between 1900 hrs and 0700 hrs daily
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To investigate whether shutting down traffic lights at low traffic times, especially at night to allow a more suitable flow of traffic, thereby reducing both CO2 and noise pollution would be a feasible proposition.
We have all been subject to the stop and start caused by unnecessary traffic light use at times of low taffic flow.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
